layout.singingstanza: As we be -- come the same as Christ In life, na -- ture, ex -- pres -- sion, and func -- tion, We are qual -- i -- fied to work with Him For His Bod -- y. As we trust in the Lord help -- less -- ly, De -- pend on Him as our love and strength, And lis -- ten to His speak -- ing, Our hope is to be rap -- tured Through the re -- demp -- tion of our bod -- y. And our prayer is— "Come, Lord Je -- sus!" And our prayer is— "Come, Lord Je -- sus!" "Come, Lord Je -- sus! Lord Je -- sus, come!"

lyrics.stanza: As we become the same as Christ In life, nature, expression, and function, We are qualified to work with Him For His Body.
As we trust in the Lord helplessly, Depend on Him as our love and strength, And listen to His speaking, Our hope is to be raptured Through the redemption of our body.
